name: fullstop3
description: the backend app for the Phonebook app

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Rename-Item build -Force -NewName dist && @powershell Move-Item dist -Force -Destination ../../../fullstop3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: relhfox
